channel.title: [fixed]
channel.description:
Just curious... I was trying to spawn a Dragonfire shield( NOT a Anti-dragon shield), and instead I get the null item glitch (the dwarf head and all that crap) The odd thing is that the item is added in every file, and it is in item.cfg. I searched, and I couldn't find anything. I guess I have to add the item?
(in fact, some items also are 'null' ex Godswords and Skill capes, the dark bow, etc.)
My client base is built on Galkon's refactured client, and my server is built on U-Rune 2.0 BETA
It seems that I am doing something wrong. If I missed something in my use of the search bar, don't hesitate to let me know.

item.title: [fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

Got it to work. ID in file was 15186, correct ID is 15185.
Sooo happy.

Read full topic

item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

I think the dfs is like a twohanded item. Change that in item.java server folder.

Get a java decompiler and decompile class8.class

item.title: [fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Look all you gotta do is go into your client folder find class8.java and search for dfs and then find its id and spawn it. if its still a null you’ll have to type add model (what ever its model ids are) and it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: [fixed]
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

you might just have the wrong codes for the uhm items your trying to spawn, because not all codes work on all clients, sometimes D plate would be 8338, for the client, but on the server its code is 8339, see what i mean?
